title: Pivot leaps into electric gravel bikes with Fazua powered E-Vault e-bike
content:
Pivot set the stage for electric mountain bikes with the Shuttle, and now it’s time for gravel. Their newest addition, the E-Vault, builds on their successful Vault gravel platform, only with the addition of a motor and a battery.
